name: Gilded Locks
description:
@bryantmakesprog

Reclaim your ancestors' lost mountain-homes. Travel the realms restoring the dwarven homelands to their former glory.

ProcJam '15 Submission. Each mountain-home is procedurally generated. The bosses are procedurally generated as well (though due to a lack of assets there are only two varieties available). Behaviours have been manually created but will be created procedurally if I choose to advance this project.

Controls:

[LEFT], [RIGHT] : Move left or right.

[UP]: Jump

[DOWN]: Enter doorway.

If you enjoy this game and would like to see more like it, please follow me on twitter (@bryantmakesprog) and check out my website (BryantMakesPrograms.com)
